text:
[Verse]
Sun is hiding far away
Clouds are gray but I'll stay
Raindrops falling on my face
I won't leave this magic place

[Verse 2]
Tunes are playing in my head
Splashing in the puddles spread
Feet are moving to the beat
Water dancing in the street

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh
Feel the rhythm flow oh
Let the raindrops show oh
This is how we glow oh

[Verse 3]
Raindrops laughter all around
Every step a joyful sound
No umbrella in my hand
I'm the leader of this band

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh
Feel the rhythm flow oh
Let the raindrops show oh
This is how we glow oh

[Bridge]
Waves of water keep us high
Together you and I
Rain can't stop our joy or pride
In the storm we glide
title: Dancing in the Rain
